grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 棄権【キケン】abstention (from voting), renunciation (of a right), withdrawal (from a contest)
棄却【キキャク】rejection, dismissal, turning down, abandoning, renunciation
投棄【トウキ】abandonment, giving up, throwing away, disposal, dumping
kun reading compounds: 捨てる【すてる】to throw away, to cast away, to dump, to discard, to abandon, to desert, to leave, to give up, to resign
